greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{x_1|n, x_2|n, ... , x_n|n} gcd(x_1,x_2, ... ,x_n).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..719
formula: If p is prime, a(p) = 2^p - 1 + p.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[n/#] * DivisorSigma[0, #]^n &]; Array[a, 20] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 10 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 10 2021
